text: Is there a more compact/efficient way of doing this?

code:
for key in kwargs:
        if key == 'log':
            self.log = kwargs[key]
        elif key == 'bin':
            self.bin = kwargs[key]
        elif key == 'pid':
            self.pid = kwargs[key]
        elif key == 'conf':
            self.conf = kwargs[key]
